turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, would you like to order some coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I will.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, from which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the Starbucks Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like with cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size do you want it in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have a grande black and white mocha with 2% with whipped cream to be picked up in daly city, ca, westlake shopping center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, great enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
